details: Kudy Kash: This is a loan-based system that enables Kudy clients to take loans from the system and pay them back when due.
Access Levels Integration: This is a service that enables role-based authentication into the already existing API.
Kudy Points: This is a system that rewards users based on a couple of events that can later be converted to cash.
Built Accademia Service which is a distributed micro-service on a VPC

Crater365: The creation of this Page Builder was my first accomplishment in IPI Solutions. It currently functions as a canvas for quite a lot of Crater365 Elements on Microsoft Sharepoint. This SAAS has been deployed to over 30 clients. Also created an API to match.
Tabulator: I recently created a database manager using MongoDB as the storage. This is needed for a long-term plan for Crater365 to be a standalone application not leveraging Microsoft any longer.
Full stack taste: This was also my first taste of Full Stack Engineering. I got prepared for the real world here.
Office Applications: I created office management applications for local businesses in my state to manage their inventory, staff, etc.
